title: Ultra Rapid Fire
body:
I am making this discussion in regards to the game mode **Ultra Rapid Fire**. It has come to my conclusion that Riot refuse to put **URF** in the rotation for the weekly game modes more often than not and it really makes my **blood boil**. I am calling all brothers and sisters that **HATE** most of the game modes in this rotation other than, Ascension and Hexakill and similar modes. 

Help raise awareness of the poor game time that **URF** gets, the one and only game mode on the rotation that i can play hours on end without getting bored. PLEASE Riot make this game mode appear in the game mode rotation more than it does at this point and time.

I mean, who even likes Nexus Siege or One for All etc.  I am hoping i am not the only one that thinks this besides my friend group that i play with, because i would be very upset. I hope that anyone who agrees with me is to **GET THE MESSAGE OUT THERE.
**
Kind regards, 1080p Blaze It. {{champion:77}}

replies.body: It's returning in the next couple of weeks. Stop being a crybaby.

> It's returning in the next couple of weeks. Stop being a crybaby.

I am not being a crybaby, URF is by far the most played/popular game mode and the fact that riot has only put it in the rotation once and other game modes like NEXUS SIEGE have already been twice is just stupid.
